Building a ChatGPT Clone with OpenAI API.Rationale: The proposed project aims to create a chatbot similar to ChatGPT using the OpenAI API, which is a widely known and used tool for developing conversational AI. While the problem itself isn't entirely novel, the ease of access provided by using the OpenAI API could make it more accessible to students and developers who may not have the resources or expertise to build such a system from scratch. However, the project doesn't seem to introduce significant methodological innovations compared to existing work.

SimilarWorks.Title: Building a Chatbot with the OpenAI API

Improving Artificial Intelligence.Rationale: The proposed project aims to improve AI in general, which is a broad and well-studied problem. However, the specific approach of this project seems to focus on optimizing AI performance by implementing adaptive learning strategies based on human cognitive processes, such as attention and memory. This combination of problem (improving AI) with an approach that leverages human cognitive processes appears to be unique in the literature. While there are studies on AI optimization and human cognitive processes separately, the integration of these two areas seems novel.
